name: Santa The Great!
description:
It's Christmas Night during the zombie apocalypse and Santa needs to deliver presents. Zombies are on his naughty list and get taken out with Santa's trusty shotgun. 

Made in roughly one and a half days. I didn't have enough time to finish the game, zombies don't have any attack yet, so you have to pretend that they are a threat :)

  • WASD to move
  • hold right mouse to  aim
  • click left mouse to shoot
  • press space to put presents under trees
